const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      mode: "synthetic",
    },
    properties: {
      flattened: {
        type: "flattened",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    flattened: {
      field: [
        {
          id: 1,
          name: "foo",
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          name: "bar",
        },
